component.name: AlphaPlot
component.summary: AlphaPlot is a free application for Scientific Data Analysis and Visualization

description.p: AlphaPlot is an open-source computer program for interactive scientific graphing and data analysis. It can generate different types of 2D and 3D plots (such as line, scatter, bar, pie, and surface plots) from data that is either imported from ASCII files, entered by hand, or using formulas.
